prerequisite.name: Test xTuple ERP version
prerequisite.message: This version of the xtpos package only works with xTuple ERP versions 3.6.0 and greater.

prerequisite.name: Ensure Point of Sale package 3.5.0 exists
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(*) = 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM pkghead WHERE ((pkghead_name = 'xtpos') AND (pkghead_version = '3.5.1' ))) AS dummy;
prerequisite.message: xTuple Point of Sale version 3.5.1 must be installed to run this upgrade package.
